The claim states that President Trump: s border wall project will result in a huge payout to Roman Abramovich due to specific requirements imposed by Trump. This aspect suggests a direct financial benefit for Abramovich from the wall project.
The expert: s verdict also mentions Trump's imposition of tariffs on steel from other countries, which allegedly eliminates competition and guarantees Abramovich the contract. This aspect implies a manipulation of trade policies to benefit Abramovich and supports the claim of a shady business deal between Trump and Russia.
